name.en: Teaching English as a Second Language

goal.ch:
理解教材設計與教學法：運用素養導向方法，融入108課綱概念，透過課程地圖，培養學生多元思考能力。
能力導向教學：結合跨域素養，設計能力導向教材，培養學生聽、說、讀、寫的綜合能力，提升批判與創新思維。
概念為本文本分析：學習概念為本的文本分析，從多角度解讀語言，培養深入思考能力。
探究問題學習：引導學生提問，培養問題導向學習，激發主動探究興趣，發展批判與解決問題能力。
透過本課程，學生將結合素養導向、108課綱等，設計富有能力導向、探究問題、概念為本特點的英文課程，提升教學成效，培養學生多元思維、創新思維與深度文本分析能力。
goal.en:
Course Objectives:

Understanding Curriculum Design and Teaching Methodology: Utilizing a competency-based approach and integrating the concepts of the 108 Curriculum Guidelines, students will incorporate these into curriculum design and teaching activities through a course roadmap, fostering diverse thinking abilities.
Competency-Driven Teaching: By merging interdisciplinary competencies and designing competency-focused teaching materials, students will cultivate comprehensive language skills in listening, speaking, reading, and writing, while enhancing critical and innovative thinking.
Concept-Based Text Analysis: Acquiring skills in concept-centric text analysis, students will interpret language from multiple perspectives, honing their ability to think deeply.
Inquiry-Based Learning: Guiding students to raise inquiries, this approach fosters inquiry-based learning, stimulating proactive exploration and fostering critical and problem-solving abilities.
Through this course, students will integrate competency-based approaches, the 108 Curriculum Guidelines, and more to design English courses emphasizing competencies and inquiry-based learning. This will elevate teaching effectiveness and develop students‘ diverse thinking, innovation, and profound text analysis skills.
